In contemporary times, as they have done since the pre-ancient past, the Eieyani Priests of Ur continue to serve as representatives of the Guardian Alliance (“GA”), the primary task force of the Interdimensional Association of Free Worlds (“IAFW”) universal service organization. During childhood, Ashayana was visited many times and escorted to Eieyani learning centers for short periods, by members of the Eieyani Priests of Ur, who initiate contact from the island of Kauai, Hawaii. Throughout adolescence, Ashayana kept numerous appointments with the Eieyani Priests, in which she was physically transported by means of interdimensional spacecraft and Merkaba, to an Emerald Order base near the island of Kauai.
